Package ch.nolix.core.specification

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SimplePersistentSpecification
    A simple persistent specification is a specification that is stored in a file.
    Specification
    A Specification can have: -1 header -several attributes that are a Specification themselves The methods of a Specification are not final that they can be overwritten by an implementation with a higher performance.
    StandardSpecification
    A StandardSpecification is a specification that is completely stored in the memory like a common object.
    Statement
    A statement consists of a specification and can have a next statement.
    SubSpecification
